data.name: Sample - Azure Key Vault - 1.0.0
data.description: Sample playbooks for "Azure Key Vault" connector. If you are planning to use any of the sample playbooks in your environment, ensure that you clone those playbooks and move them to a different collection, since the sample playbook collection gets deleted during connector upgrade and delete.

workflows.name: Get Key Vault
workflows.description: Gets the specified Azure key vault.

arguments.title: Azure Key Vault: Get Key Vault

workflows.name: Update Vault's Access Policies
workflows.description: Updates access policies in the specified Azure key vault based on input parameters you have specified.

arguments.title: Azure Key Vault: Update Vault's Access Policies

workflows.name: Delete Certificate
workflows.description: Deletes certificate from the Azure Key Vault.

workflows.name: Get All Certificates
workflows.description: Retrieves a list of the certificates from the Azure Key Vault based on the input parameters you have specified.

arguments.title: Azure Key Vault: Get All Certificates

workflows.name: List Key Vaults
workflows.description: The List operation gets information about the vaults associated with the subscription.

arguments.title: Azure Key Vault: List Key Vaults

workflows.name: Get Key Details
workflows.description: Gets the public part of a stored key from Azure Key Vault.

arguments.title: Azure Key Vault: Get Key Details

workflows.name: Delete Key
workflows.description: Deletes a key from storage in Azure Key Vault based on the input parameters you have specified.

workflows.name: Get All Secrets
workflows.description: Retrieves a list of the secrets from the Azure Key Vault based on the input parameters you have specified.

arguments.title: Azure Key Vault: Get All Secrets

workflows.name: Get Certificate Details
workflows.description: Retrieves the certificate details from the Azure Key Vault based on the input parameters you have specified.

arguments.title: Azure Key Vault: Get Certificate Details

workflows.name: Delete Secret
workflows.description: Deletes the Secret from specified vault in Azure Key Vault.

workflows.name: Get All Keys
workflows.description: Retrieves a list of the keys from the Azure Key Vault based on the input parameters you have specified.

arguments.title: Azure Key Vault: Get All Keys

workflows.name: Get Secret Details
workflows.description: Gets a Secret from specified Azure Key Vault.

arguments.title: Azure Key Vault: Get Secret Details

workflows.name: Get Versions
workflows.description: Gets Versions of specified secret, key or certificate from Azure Key Vault based on the input parameters you have specified.

workflows.name: Delete Key Vault
workflows.description: Deletes the specified vault form Azure key vault.

arguments.title: Azure Key Vault: Delete Key Vault

workflows.name: Get Certificate Policy
workflows.description: Retrieves the specified certificate policy resources in the specified key vault.

arguments.title: Azure Key Vault: Get Certificate Policy
